alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:31PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Graham and northern Greenlee Counties through 215 PM MST... At 131 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Hannagan Meadow, or 24 miles north of Clifton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rose Peak. This includes Route 191 between mile markers 179 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
